# Overview of trials

# Interventional Trials

```{r one, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(DT)
library(magrittr)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)


d<-read_csv('regCovid_int_a.csv')
#names(d)
prefix='https://ClinicalTrials.gov/show/'
d$link<-paste0(prefix,d$nct_id)
d2<-d %>% select(nct_id,brief_title,link) 
kable(d2)


```
